Source.name: EBS Sensor: FIN PA Raw And Burden Cost For Adjustment Lines Are Not Matching With Original Expenditure Item - Weekly
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: FIN PA Raw And Burden Cost For Adjustment Lines Are Not Matching With Original Expenditure Item - Weekly
Source.Description: Raw And Burden Cost For Adjustment Lines Are Not Matching With Original Expenditure Item

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_FIN_PA_BURD_ACTUALS_DIFF_ORIGINAL_COST' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'expenditure_group:' || s.expenditure_group || ', reversing_exp_item_id:' || s.reversing_exp_item_id || ', orig_exp_item_id:' || s.orig_exp_item_id || ', project_number:' || s.project_number key_data FROM (SELECT e.expenditure_group expenditure_group, cei.expenditure_item_id reversing_exp_item_id, cei.adjusted_expenditure_item_id orig_exp_item_id, p.segment1 project_number FROM apps.pa_expenditure_items_all ei, apps.pa_expenditure_items_all cei, apps.pa_expenditures_all e, apps.pa_projects_all p WHERE e.expenditure_id = ei.expenditure_id AND cei.adjusted_expenditure_item_id = ei.expenditure_item_id AND cei.net_zero_adjustment_flag = 'Y' AND ei.net_zero_adjustment_flag = 'Y' AND cei.project_id = p.project_id AND (NVL(cei.raw_cost,0) <> (NVL(ei.raw_cost,0) * -1) OR NVL(cei.burden_cost,0) <> (NVL(ei.burden_cost,0) * -1) OR NVL(cei.denom_raw_cost,0) <> (NVL(ei.denom_raw_cost,0) * -1) OR NVL(cei.denom_burdened_cost,0) <> (NVL(ei.denom_burdened_cost,0) * -1) OR NVL(cei.acct_raw_cost,0) <> (NVL(ei.acct_raw_cost,0) * -1) OR NVL(cei.acct_burdened_cost,0) <> (NVL(ei.acct_burdened_cost,0) * -1) OR NVL(cei.project_raw_cost,0) <> (NVL(ei.project_raw_cost,0) * -1) OR NVL(cei.project_burdened_cost,0) <> (NVL(ei.project_burdened_cost,0) * -1)) AND cei.creation_date >= SYSDATE - 7 AND rownum <= 5) s
